original_text: as were the entrances of the chambers on the south. There was an entrance at the beginning of the passage, the passage before the corresponding wall on the east as one enters them.
korean_text: 이 남쪽 방에 출입하는 문이 있는데 담 동쪽 길 어귀에 있더라

sentences.original_text: as were the entrances of the chambers on the south.
There was an entrance at the beginning of the passage,
the passage before the corresponding wall on the east
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 동쪽의 대응하는 벽 앞에 있는 통로였습니다.
